parameters.name: gatewayId
parameters.description: The ID of the Cloud-native API Gateway instance.

parameters.name: keyword
parameters.description: The search keyword. You can fuzzy-search by API name or exact-search by API ID.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The API name that is used for the search. In this case, exact search is performed.

parameters.name: pageNumber
parameters.description: The page number of the page to return. Pages start from page 1. Default value: 1.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. Valid values: 1 to 100. Default value: 10.

parameters.name: types
parameters.description:
The API type. You can specify multiple types and separate them with a comma (,).

*   Http
*   Rest
*   WebSocket
*   HttpIngress

parameters.name: withAuthPolicyInEnvironmentId
parameters.description: The consumer authentication policy in the specified environment in each returned API.

parameters.name: withConsumerInfoById
parameters.description: The authorization rules of the specified consumer in each returned API.

parameters.name: withPluginAttachmentByPluginId
parameters.description: The plug-in ID. You can use the returned value of this parameter to query the plug-in.
